content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Mining Area (around position -20, -50)
Consists of following entities:
- Copper mining setup: Burner mining drill (position -28, -61) with wooden chest (-27.5, -59.5)
- Iron mining setup 1: Burner mining drill (-19, -50) with wooden chest (-18.5, -48.5)
- Iron mining setup 2: Burner mining drill (-15, -50) with wooden chest (-14.5, -48.5)

###Smelting Area (around position 0, 0)
Consists of following entities:
- Copper smelting: Stone furnace (-6, 0)
- Iron smelting setup 1: Stone furnace (0, 0) with input inserter (-1.5, 0.5) and input chest (-2.5, 0.5)
- Iron smelting setup 2: Stone furnace (2, 0) with:
  - Input inserter (3.5, 0.5) and input chest (4.5, 0.5)
  - Output inserter (2.5, 1.5) and output chest (2.5, 2.5)
- Additional output inserter (0.5, 1.5) with chest (0.5, 2.5)

###Power Generation (around position -10, 20)
Consists of:
- Boiler (-12, 20.5)
- Steam engine (-8.5, 20.5)
- Offshore pump (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network connecting water supply
- Electric pole network connecting power to machines

###Assembly Area (around position 13, 5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 1 (13.5, 5.5) set for electronic circuit production
- Input inserter (11.5, 5.5)
- Connected to power grid via electric pole (12.5, 3.5)

###Research Area
Lab placed and connected to power grid (position not specified)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities in occupied spaces
- Check if target location is clear before placing labs or assembling machines
- Ensure no other entities or terrain features block placement
- Use different coordinates if initial placement fails

### Errors with fuel management
- Keep coal in inventory for refueling machines
- Monitor fuel levels in burner inserters and mining drills
- Harvest more coal when running low

### Research related errors
- Cannot start research that is already completed
- Ensure research prerequisites are met before starting new research
- Check if research is actually in progress before checking progress

### Resource management
- Empty full output chests regularly to prevent mining stoppage
- Ensure proper input materials are available for assembling machines
- Monitor and maintain proper fuel distribution across all machines
